name: Martin Garcia
text: Are Netflix type in-house shows out of your list  Roy Tang  ? Daredevil 1 and 2 gets my vote for Super hero themed shows on tv/stream this year.

source_obj.text: Are Netflix type in-house shows out of your list  Roy Tang  ? Daredevil 1 and 2 gets my vote for Super hero themed shows on tv/stream this year.

replies.text: I find it difficult to compare them to the weekly-type shows. The Netflix ones are a lot shorter and I tend to watch them in 2-3 days
